data.oai_dc:dc: Ostracoda assemblage in sediment core PS1003-2

ANT-I/2, Aversovalva hydrodynamica, AWI_Paleo, Counting >125 µm fraction, Cytherella sp., Cytheropteron antarcticum, Cytheropteron carolinae, Cytheropteron paucipunctatum, Cytheropteron porterae, Cytheropteron tressleri, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Dutoitella suhmi, Echinocythereis sp., Eucytherura calabra, Gravity corer (Kiel type), Henryhowella asperrima, Henryhowella dasyderma, Kapp Norvegia, Krithe spp., Legitimocythere acanthoderma, Paleoenvironmental Reconstructions from Marine Sediments @ AWI, Pelecocythere galleta, Pennyella dorsoserrata, Polarstern, Poseidonamicus anteropunctatus, Poseidonamicus pintoi, PS01, PS01/130, PS1003-2, Pterygocythere mucronalatum, Saida sp., SL
